CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 8, 1961, pg. 19 reads: "Minister's Wives - Members of the Silver Chord Interdenominational Minister's Wives Association sponsored their annual Easter bonnet luncheon, Monday, at Sixth Mt. Zion Baptist Church. The ladies in their pretty bonnets, packed the place.  Seated, left to right, are: Mmes. J.C. Hairston, G.L. Bowick, James B. Cayce, J.A. Harris and R.W.Twiggs.  Standing, in the same order: Mmes. B.S. Mason, J.G. Magee and Mrs. F.W. Thompson of Washington, Pa. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Silver Chord members, from left, seated: Mrs. J.C. Hairston, Mrs. G.L. Bowick, Mrs. James B. Cayce, Mrs. J.A. Harris, and Mrs. R.W.Twiggs; standing: Mrs. B.S. Mason, Mrs. J.G. Magee, and Mrs. F.W. Thompson, gathered behind table in Sixth Mt. Zion Baptist Church for Easter bonnet luncheon
